overview: Collection of three short films from Falcon Studios. "I Always Wanted You" — Tom felt a warm feeling of excitement rush through his loins as Dan moved his hand slowly up his leg. Tom knew it was too late to stop now, he wanted Dan to have him now! "Welcome Home" — Dave left the Army just five months before. In the service there wasn't any chance to satisfy his desire, but his buddy Gary was going to spend a few weeks with him… There is nothing these guys won't do! "Superstar" — John Holmes mounts a heavy anal attack on a boy barely half his height. Watch this boy take all of that huge tool!
title: The Biggest Of Them All
